history.heading: Equipment, not specified by 3B993.c.1, designed for anisotropic etching of dielectric material and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features having all of the following:
history.title: Equipment, not specified by 3B993.c.1, designed for anisotropic etching of dielectric material and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3B993 Specified semiconductor manufacturing equipment as follows (see list of items controls).
history.text:
Equipment, not specified by 3B993.c.1, designed for anisotropic etching of dielectric material and enabling the fabrication of high aspect ratio features having all of the following:
An aspect ratio greater than 30:1; and
c.2.a. An aspect ratio greater than 30:1; and
A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.
c.2.b. A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.
Note: 3B993.c.2 does not apply to equipment designed for wafer diameters less than 300 mm.

content.html: c.2.a. An aspect ratio greater than 30:1; and
content.text: c.2.a. An aspect ratio greater than 30:1; and

children.heading: A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.
children.label: 3B993.c.2.b – A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.

content.html: c.2.b. A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.
content.text: c.2.b. A lateral dimension on the top surface of less than 40 nm.

content.html:
Note:

3B993.c.2 does not apply to equipment designed for wafer diameters less than 300 mm.
content.text: Note: 3B993.c.2 does not apply to equipment designed for wafer diameters less than 300 mm.
